name: WWII Elevator Escape
description:
You are part of the German Resistance and you have managed to infiltrate Hitler's inner circle. Now you have obtained the crucial information, it is time to escape!

A polished jam entry with the following requirements:

* WWII theme * Max. 4 locations * Escape a vehicle * Reach safety *

More info about the jam:

Adrift GameJam January 2022 - ADRIFT Forum
